16 #include "ros/ros.h"
17 #include "modelica_bridge/ModComm.h"
18 
22 #define MAX_ARRAY 100
23 
24 ros::Publisher control_pub;
25 
26 double springSetPoints[MAX_ARRAY] = {0.0};
27 
38 void controlCallback(const modelica_bridge::ModComm::ConstPtr& feedback_val) {
39 
40  modelica_bridge::ModComm control_val;
41  for(int i = 0; i < feedback_val->size; i++) {
42  control_val.data.push_back(5 * (springSetPoints[i] - feedback_val->data[i]));
43  }
44  control_val.size = control_val.data.size();
45 
46  control_pub.publish(control_val);
47 }
48 
57 void joyCallback(const modelica_bridge::ModComm::ConstPtr& inJoy) {
58  for(int i = 0; i<inJoy->size; i++) {
59  springSetPoints[i] = inJoy->data[i];
60  }
61 }
62 
70 int main(int argc, char **argv)
71 {
72  ros::init(argc, argv, "modbridge_examples_controller");
73  ros::NodeHandle n;
74 
75  control_pub = n.advertise<modelica_bridge::ModComm>("control_values", 1);
76  ros::Subscriber feedback_sub = n.subscribe("model_values", 1, controlCallback);
77  ros::Subscriber joy_sub = n.subscribe("modbridge_joy", 1, joyCallback);
78 
79  ros::spin();
80 
81  return 0;
82 }
